title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 253 - GENERAL PROVISIONS RELATING TO ALL NON-FLFLPA PROCEEDINGS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 253 - GENERAL PROVISIONS RELATING TO ALL NON-FLFLPA PROCEEDINGS
State Regulations

Joinder (§ 253.1 to 253.2)

Motions (§ 253.3 to 253.4)

Waiver (§ 253.5)

Intervention (§ 253.6)

Consolidation or Severance (§ 253.7)

Witnesses and Subpoenas (§ 253.8 to 253.9)

Conferences and Hearings (§ 253.10 to 253.60)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 253

Amended

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

Statutory authority: Labor Law, art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
